author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Regional Provident Fund Commissioner (II), Sub-Regional Office, Vellore, is conducting “Nidhi Aapke Nikat” for redressing the grievances of Employees’ Provident Fund (EPF) subscribers, employers and exempted establishments on April 11.

Subscribers/employers/exempted establishments have been advised to avail the opportunity and register their grievances before April 8.

The meeting will be held for EPF subscribers from 10.30 a.m. to 1 p.m., while it will be conducted for employers from 3 p.m. to 4 p.m. and for exempted establishments from 4 p.m. to 5 p.m., a press release said.

The employers have been advised to participate in the meeting to discuss the recent developments and clarify any doubts in the EPF and MP Act, 1952. The grievances, which are pending for more than a month, can be registered through post/fax - 0416-2254340/email – sro.vellore@epfindia.gov.in.

The provident fund account number/PPO number and nature of grievances should be mentioned along with telephone no/fax no/email id by super scribing the envelope “Nidhi Aapke Nikat” and sent to the Public Relations Officers, Sub-Regional Office, S-I, TNHB, Phase-III, Sathuvachari, Vellore – 632 009, the release said.

Employers called to participate in meeting to discuss developments and clarify any doubts
title: EPF grievance redressal meet on April 11
